turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Head injury.
turn.1: What are the complications of head injury?
turn.2: Complications may include cerebral edema and transtentorial herniation.
turn.4: The goal of treatment should be to treat the increased intracranial pressure.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Diffuse axonal injury, or DAI, usually occurs as the result of an acceleration or deceleration motion, not necessarily an impact.
turn.9: What is the mechanism of action?
turn.10: Axons are stretched and damaged when parts of the brain of differing density slide over one another.
turn.12: Prognoses vary widely depending on the extent of damage.
